Optionally essential well define virtual stand tree inventory, user can define inventory zone argument core_polygon_df. polygon defined data.frame contains relative coordinates x y vertices zone trees inventoried. cell_size argument defines precision SamsaRaLight ray-tracing model. ray-tracing model casts rays towards center cell estimate light arriving cell attenuation tree crowns smaller cells defined, rays model casts per m2. default cell_size 10, leading fast computation time. user can go towards maximum precision 1 (1m*1m square cells) produce high-resolution shading maps (see end tutorial), lead much heavier computation time memory use.
